name: Hydrapak Seeker 3L Water Container
description: The beauty of a soft bottle lies in the fact that, once empty, it compacts to the size of a fist. The opening is a standard size so it works with other lids. Ideal for carrying extra water on a hike, to the gym or anywhere else you need water and carry space is limited.Soft, grippable TPU is RF welded to create leak-proof bonds.BPA-free, PVC-free and meets or exceeds FDA and EU regulations.Comes with a storage bag.Top and side fabric loops let you attach or hang it.42mm cap allows you to drink and pour with ease.Can be frozen or filled with warm water (max temp 60°C).
